name: Class Reunion Chat Room
description:
"THIS STORY IS A WARNING. YOU COULD BE NEXT."

Amy receives an invitation to a group chat set up by some of her former classmates. Its purpose is to reconnect after all these years. But soon more and more disturbing facts about Amy's classmates are revealed, and Amy begins to fear that the people she's texting with may not be what they seem.

Class Reunion Chat Room immerses you into Amy's role by letting you type her predefined chat messages. What you're supposed to type is visible in gray letters. What you are currently typing will be overlaid in black letters. If you've typed everything correctly, then your black text should overlay the gray text perfectly. Press "Enter" or klick the send button on the right hand side of the text box to send your message. If you're unable to send your message then you haven't typed the message correctly. Make sure not to forget any easy to miss dots and commas.

This visual novel has a playtime of about 20–30 minutes.

Features

  • Over 5000 words in length.
  • 20–30 minutes playtime.
  • Original music and sound design.
  • Text input system that lets you write Amy's predefined messages.
  • Authentic chat interface and experience.
